00020         THING_HASHT,
00021         THING_HASH_ELEMENT,

00033 
00034 struct rewrite_thing_t {
00035         things                   type;
00036         rewrite_thing_t         *next;
00037         
00038         union {
00039                 struct {
00040                         // THING_HASHT_KEY
00041                         hashkey_t               array_key;
00042 
00043                         // THING_HASHT or THING_CONST or THING_VARIABLE
00044                         unsigned int             id;
00045                 };
00046                 // THING_ACTION_BLOCK
00047                 rewrite_action_block_t  *block;
00048 
00049                 // THING_LIST
00050                 rewrite_thing_t         *list;
00051         };
00052 };

00056         data_t                   data;
00057 };

00064 };
